text: Write down the output of the given program. [2] DECLARE SUB Series(A)​ CLS​ A=20​ CALL Series(A)​ END SUB Series(A)​ FOR K=1 to 5​ PRINT A;​ A=A+10​ NEXT K​ END SUB
norm: write down the output of the given program. [2] declare sub series(a)​ cls​ a=20​ call series(a)​ end sub series(a)​ for k=1 to 5​ print a;​ a=a+10​ next k​ end sub
